ActorTalk: Oh! Hey there, Gray Raven Commandant! Are you here to check out the museum? I can be your personal tour guide, free of charge!
Know it well? That's an understatement! My students always say that if I'm not in the classroom, I'm here.
I mean, I'm just so passionate about Golden Age art that I can sit here all day.
When you have time, could you show me around?
